body_html:
Ah, your ndk api_level is too low: it needs to be at least 14.

I'd also leave the NDK at r12b (this is not tied directly to the api_level) for the time being until Bazel is confirmed to have no issues with anything more recent. I think the narrowing cast errors you were getting earlier may have come from that incompatibility.

body:
Ah, your ndk api_level is too low: it needs to be at least 14.

I'd also leave the NDK at r12b (this is not tied directly to the api_level) for the time being until Bazel is confirmed to have no issues with anything more recent. I think the narrowing cast errors you were getting earlier may have come from that incompatibility.
